login.subtitle: Enter your Admin Key to access the admin panel
login.invalidKey: Invalid Admin Key or server connection failed
login.footer: Clove - A full-powered Claude reverse proxy!

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.manageAccountsDesc: Add, edit, or delete Claude accounts

accounts.title: Account Management
accounts.subtitle: Manage your Claude accounts
accounts.noAccountsDesc: Click "Add Cookie" or "OAuth Login" to create your first account
accounts.deleteConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this account?
accounts.deleteConfirmDesc: This action cannot be undone. The account will be removed from Clove, but your data on Claude.ai will not be affected.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your application configuration and keys
settings.noApiKeys: No API keys yet. Please add your first key.
settings.deleteApiKeyDesc: This action cannot be undone. Applications using this key will lose API access.
settings.enterOrGenerateKey: Enter or generate a new key
settings.noAdminKeys: No admin keys yet. Please add your first key.
settings.deleteAdminKeyDesc: This action cannot be undone. You will no longer be able to access the admin panel with this key.
settings.useRealRolesDesc: Enable to use real role prefixes
settings.allowExternalImagesDesc: Allow the reverse proxy to load external images
settings.preserveChatsDesc: Keep chat history for later viewing

accountModal.descAdd: Add a new Claude account cookie
accountModal.invalidUuid: Please enter a valid UUID format
accountModal.preferredAuthDesc: When the account has both Cookie and OAuth, choose the preferred authentication method
accountModal.cookieWarningDesc: The cookie format you entered may be incorrect. The standard format should start with "sessionKey=sk-ant-sid01-".
accountModal.cookieWarningNote: If you are using a reverse proxy or custom configuration, you can ignore this warning and proceed.

oauthModal.title: OAuth Login
oauthModal.desc: Add a Claude account using OAuth
oauthModal.invalidUuid: Please enter a valid UUID format
oauthModal.orgUuidHint: Can be found in the lastActiveOrg field of your Claude.ai cookie
oauthModal.authPageOpened: Authorization page has been opened in a new window. After completing authorization, copy the authorization code and paste it below.
oauthModal.recommendCookie: It is recommended to add accounts using Cookie, as Clove can automatically complete authentication. OAuth login is only an alternative.

batchModal.title: Batch Add Cookies
batchModal.desc: Add multiple Claude account cookies at once
batchModal.placeholder:
Paste your cookies, one per line...

Example:
sk-ant-sid01-xxxxx
sk-ant-sid01-yyyyy
sessionKey=sk-ant-sid01-zzzzz
batchModal.supportedFormats: Supports pasting sessionKey directly or the complete cookie format
batchModal.completeMessageWithErrors: Processing complete! Successfully added {{success}} accounts, {{error}} failed.
